column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This is one of my favorite places to have breakfast as it does have a separate menu from the items on display.  The coffee here is also some of the best I've had in Houston
column3: we've really enjoyed the sausage breakfast sandwich and onion bialy.  The pastry case has different croissants and divine chocolate chip cookies
column4: moving on to luscious seasonal cakes and custards.  The macarons are solid and a perfect little dessert to breakfast.  I always leave with a loaf of bread as there are no other artisanal bread bakers in Houston.  Must be the humidity.  You cannot get a baguette or ciabatta worth a damn anywhere else.
